code: function a(e){let t=!1;e.on(r.aB.Destroy,()=>t=!0);let n=async()=>{if(t)return;let a=[];e.eachConnection(e=>a.push({connection:e,stats:e.emitStats()}));let o=[];for(let e of a){let t=await e.stats;null!=t&&o.push({connection:e.connection,stats:t})}e.emit(r.aB.ConnectionStats,o),setTimeout(n,i.T)};setTimeout(n,i.T)}
